name: Duck Diver
description:
For a friend who's always wanted to do that.

You play a maniacal diver underwater that wants to drown ducks by pulling them from their legs.

Watch the bubbles to know where you are.

You move with left thumbstick or WASD or arrow keys. Capture ducks with space or A/X.

Each capture attempt increases your total time by 3s.

Capture all 10 ducks in the smallest amount of time for awesome score.
